notes: Census extracted from production database (4,551 legal documents, 36,014 provisions).
Source: Legilux — Luxembourg official consolidated legislation portal.
French-language corpus. Luxembourg is a trilingual jurisdiction (FR/DE/LB) but Legilux publishes primarily in French.
